response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. This item holds significant worth to me, but I am confident it could be an exceptional addition to your collection or business. Before we proceed, I would like to offer you the chance to make this acquisition at an exclusive price tailored to your needs.

I am proposing to sell the product to you for $950,000. This offer is designed to ensure that both parties benefit and to give you the chance to secure this remarkable item at a competitive price.

Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations or if you require further information about the product. I am more than happy to provide any additional details you might need.

Looking forward to your response,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
